root: ^Player` Woah, there are so many mirrors.

c-0: ^Player` I wonder how many kids get lost in here...
^Player` Wait, this one looks different than the others. Huh, that's a neat effect.
^Player` It almost makes it look like a portal. Like I could go right through it...
^Player` Woah! What's happening? What's going on? This isn't what a hall of Mirrors is supposed to do!
